name: BacklogBoard WI
wiql: select [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.Tags] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = @project and [System.WorkItemType] <> '' and [System.State] <> '' and [System.BoardColumn] = 'New' and [System.IterationPath] Under '$projectId$'
